scripts.install-all: npm run install-gnostr-cat && npm run install-jq && npm run install-curl && npm run install-python3 && npm run install-cargo
scripts.install-cargo: type -P cargo || curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | bash -s -- -y --no-modify-path --default-toolchain stable --profile default & . $HOME/.cargo/env
scripts.install-gnostr-cat: $(which cargo || npm run install-cargo) install gnostr-cat
scripts.install-jq: type -P jq || $(which apt-get || which brew) install jq
scripts.install-curl: type -P curl || $(which apt-get >/tmp/gnostr-web.log || which brew) install curl
scripts.install-python3: type -P python3 || $(which apt-get || which brew) install python3
